version_description:
* Resolved an issue with large uploads in Audio Blocks.
* Resolved an issue where Promotional Pop-up, Announcement Bar, and cookie banners were displaying while in edit mode.
* Resolved an issue preventing blog post duplication.
* Improvements

* Resolved an issue with large uploads in Audio Blocks.
* Resolved an issue where Promotional Pop-up, Announcement Bar, and cookie banners were displaying while in edit mode.
* Resolved an issue preventing blog post duplication.
* Improvements

This release contains minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for all of your reviews and feedback so far— we’re actively working on more features, including an iPad app, and hope to share them with you very soon.

This release contains minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

We’re pleased to introduce the much requested Squarespace app for iPad! In this version, you’ll discover all the functionality of the iPhone app tailored to a beautiful tablet experience. There’s more to come here but we hope you like it!

Also wit

We’re pleased to introduce the much requested Squarespace app for iPad! In this version, you’ll discover all the functionality of the iPhone app tailored to a beautiful tablet experience. There’s more to come here but we hope you like it!

Also wit

Resolves an issue that caused the app to crash at login for some users.

This app was submitted courtesy of Charlotte on Take Your Child To Work Day. Thanks Charlotte!

Resolved an issue preventing access to blog post settings.
Resolved an issue preventing access to blog post settings.
Resolved an issue with dragging and dropping blocks from the block menu.
Resolved an issue with dragging and dropping blocks from the block menu.

This update introduces the ability to create new collections on the go. In addition to editing existing collections, you can now add new Galleries, Blogs, Pages, Folders and Link collections directly from the app. Support for additional collection types i

This update introduces the ability to create new collections on the go. In addition to editing existing collections, you can now add new Galleries, Blogs, Pages, Folders and Link collections directly from the app. Support for additional collection types i

This update resolves an issue with Folder collections not available in the collection creation menu for certain templates, as well as a number of small issues relating to content editing within Index Pages.

What’s New
• Stand out in any inbox with Squarespace Email Campaigns. You can create, send, and track engaging emails on the go. Import content from your website to draft emails in minutes, manage your mailing list, save drafts, and more.
• Persona

Support for managing your Squarespace 7.1 website. Squarespace 7.1 is an updated site building experience with more flexible and easier to use options for adding content and styling your site's fonts, colors and more.

Support for managing your Squarespace 7.1 website. Squarespace 7.1 is an updated site building experience with more flexible and easier to use options for adding content and styling your site's fonts, colors and more.

Fixes
* Improved the image picker when uploading images to a gallery.

Fixes
* Improved the image picker when uploading images to a gallery.
